briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study Comparing ABT-335 Coadministered With Atorvastatin and Ezetimibe to Atorvastatin Coadministered With Ezetimibe in Subjects With Multiple Abnormal Lipid (Fat) Levels in the Blood

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects with mixed dyslipidemia (trigylcerides, \> or = to 150 mg/dL to \< 400 mg/dL; HDL-C \< 40 mg/dL for males, \< 50 mg/dL for females; LDL-C, \> or = to 130 mg/dL).
* Subjects must agree to use adequate birth control methods and to adhere to the American Heart Association (AHA) Diet.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects with unstable or uncontrolled medical conditions considered inappropriate in a clinical trial.
* Subjects with an unstable dose of medications or receiving Coumadin, oral, intravenous or intramuscular cyclosporine, statins, or certain other medications.
* Women who are pregnant or plan on becoming pregnant, or women who are lactating.

outcomeMeasures.title: Median Percent Change in Triglycerides From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 triglycerides minus baseline triglycerides)/baseline triglycerides\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Apolipoprotein AI (apoAI) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 apoAI minus baseline apoAI)/baseline apoAI\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (HDL-C) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 HDL-C minus baseline HDL-C)/baseline HDL-C\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Very Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (VLDL-C) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 VLDL-C minus baseline VLDL-C)/baseline VLDL-C\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Apolipoprotein CIII (apoCIII) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 apoCIII minus baseline apoCIII)/baseline apoCIII\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Non-High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (Non-HDL-C) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 non-HDL-C minus baseline non-HDL-C)/baseline non-HDL-C\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percent Change in Apolipoprotein B (apoB) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 apoB minus baseline apoB)/baseline apoB\] x 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Median Percent Change in High-Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein (hsCRP) From Baseline to Final Visit
outcomeMeasures.description: \[(Week 12 hsCRP minus baseline hsCRP)/baseline hSCRP\] x 100
